3D Printing Services

Custom 3D printing with Creality Ender 3 S1 Pro (FDM) and Elegoo Saturn 2 (resin) printers.

Coming Soon: We're planning to launch an Etsy store for our 3D printing services in the near future. Currently, we're in the testing phase and not accepting commercial orders.

Startup Status: Our 3D printing services are currently in development. We're showcasing our capabilities and designs while we prepare for our official launch. The information below represents our planned offerings.

Our 3D Printing Services

We offer hobby-level 3D printing services for personal projects, prototypes, and small models.

Disclaimer: Our 3D printing services are currently in development and will be launching on Etsy soon. We are a startup and not yet a full commercial printing service. The information below represents our planned offerings once we officially launch. We're currently building our portfolio and testing our capabilities.

🔍

3D Model Design

Creation of 3D models from concept sketches or specifications. Our expert designers will bring your ideas to life.

Contact for custom pricing
📷

3D Scanning

High-resolution scanning of physical objects for digital reproduction. Perfect for creating digital twins of existing items.

Contact for custom pricing
⚡

Rapid Prototyping

Quick turnaround printing of concept models and prototypes. Get your ideas into physical form fast.

Contact for custom pricing
🔧

Functional Prototypes

Printing of functional prototypes with specific material properties. Test your designs in real-world conditions.

Contact for custom pricing
🏭

Small Batch Production

Production of small batches of parts or products. Ideal for limited runs or market testing.

Contact for custom pricing
🎨

Finishing & Post-Processing

Professional finishing services including sanding, painting, and assembly of printed parts.

Contact for custom pricing

Material Options

We offer a wide range of materials to suit your specific needs, from standard PLA to specialized engineering materials.

FDM Materials

PLA

Biodegradable, easy to print. Ideal for decorative items and prototypes.

Eco-friendly Low Cost

PETG

Durable and chemical resistant. Great for functional parts.

Durable Water-resistant

TPU

Flexible and elastic. Perfect for soft, bendable parts.

Flexible Impact Resistant

Resin Materials

Standard Resin

High detail and smooth surface finish. Perfect for miniatures.

High Detail Smooth Finish

ABS-Like Resin

Tough and durable. Suitable for functional prototypes.

Durable Heat Resistant

Dental Resin

Biocompatible and precise. Ideal for dental applications.

Medical Grade High Precision

Material Selection Guide

For Prototypes

PLA or Standard Resin for quick iterations and visual prototypes.

For Functional Parts

PETG or ABS-Like Resin for durability and strength.

For Detailed Models

Standard Resin for high-detail miniatures and artistic pieces.

Tycen's 3D Models on Creality Cloud

The 3D models cannot be displayed due to security restrictions. We've included previews of some featured models below. For the full interactive experience, please visit our Creality Cloud profile.

View Model

Articulated Dragon

Fully articulated dragon with 20 joints. Print-in-place design requires no assembly. Perfect for testing printer calibration.

View Model

Crypto Mining Rig Case

Custom case for GPU mining rigs with optimized airflow. Designed for 6-8 GPUs with cable management.

View Model

AI Assistant Figurine

Decorative figurine inspired by modern AI assistants. Features detailed circuitry patterns and LED light mount.

View Model

Raspberry Pi 4 Case

A ventilated case for Raspberry Pi 4 with easy access to all ports and good airflow for cooling. Includes mounting options.

View Model

Mechanical Keyboard Keycap

Custom keycap designs for mechanical keyboards. Compatible with Cherry MX switches and most mechanical keyboards.

View Model

Cursor AI Logo Stand

Desktop stand featuring the Cursor AI logo. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and developers.

View Model

Cable Management System

Comprehensive cable management system for streaming setups. Includes desk clips, wall mounts, and label holders.

View Model

Raspberry Pi Cluster Case

Stackable case for Raspberry Pi cluster computing. Supports up to 8 Pi units with integrated cooling.

Our Equipment

We use state-of-the-art 3D printing equipment to ensure the highest quality results.

Premium

Creality Ender Series

Our Creality Ender 3 S1 Pro printers offer exceptional precision and reliability for FDM printing, with a build volume of 220x220x270mm and direct drive extruder for superior print quality.

FDM PLA PETG TPU ABS
Build Volume: 220 x 220 x 250mm
Layer Height: 0.1 - 0.4mm
High Detail

Resin Printers

Our Elegoo Saturn 2 8K MSLA resin printer delivers ultra-high resolution prints (7680×4320 pixels) with smooth surfaces, perfect for detailed models, miniatures, and functional prototypes.

MSLA 8K Resolution Standard Resin ABS-Like Water-Washable
Build Volume: 130 x 80 x 160mm
Layer Height: 0.01 - 0.05mm
